meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Cinthea Stahl Lance Williams Judi Greenberg Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #702.

td.p: Cinthea Stahl, a student from Studio City, California
Lance Williams, a media consultant from Los Angeles, California
Judi Greenberg, a housewife from Northbrook, Illinois (whose 1-day cash winnings total $3,500)

tr.td: TOP-SELLING PRODUCTS
LIGHT
4-LETTER WORDS
MYTHOLOGY
"MOORE" OR "LES"
MUSIC ON THE MAP

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: Cinthea, did you get the correct response? [Cinthea had a hand in front of her face and shook her head no in embarrassment.] What is food car?)
(Cinthea: Consumption?)
(Alex: "Branded them "XP" for food consumption?)
[Audible background reaction]
(Cinthea: Extra prime?)
[More reaction and laughter.]
(Alex: I like that.)
JudiWhat is?
$1,800
LanceWhat is the Pony Express?
$3,200
CintheaWhat is [something scribbled out] food con
$0
Pony Express')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'William Russell bought over 400 horses for this business & branded them "XP"')

tr.td: HORSES
William Russell bought over 400 horses for this business & branded them "XP"
Judi
Lance
Cinthea
3rd place: Baldwin solid brass desk accessories + Jeopardy! box game or computerized version
2nd place: Harrison Furniture entertainment center & Zenith 9" color TV + Jeopardy! box game or computerized version
New champion: $6,600
Judi
Lance
Cinthea

14 R
(including 1 DD),
5 W

(including 1 DD),
